abstract: Eric Ries and Steven Blank think they have a better way to build a start-up, one that takes less time and money to try new ideas and find paying customers. They are leading proponents of the “lean start-up” — a fresh approach to creating companies.
snippet: Eric Ries and Steven Blank think they have a better way to build a start-up, one that takes less time and money to try new ideas and find paying customers. They are leading proponents of the “lean start-up” — a fresh approach to creating companies...
lead_paragraph: Eric Ries and Steven Blank think they have a better way to build a start-up, one that takes less time and money to try new ideas and find paying customers. They are leading proponents of the “lean start-up” — a fresh approach to creating companies that has attracted much attention in the last year or so among Silicon Valley entrepreneurs, technologists and investors.

headline.main: The Rise of the Fleet-Footed Start-Up

abstract: Netflix continues to add job listings seeking programmers with experience on the Google Android platform.
snippet: Netflix continues to add job listings seeking programmers with experience on the Google Android platform.
lead_paragraph: When Netflix opened its doors for business in 1998 it offered one product: DVDs by mail. Since then the video company has plastered itself everywhere.

headline.main: Which Android Platform Is Netflix Working On?
